title: How well do you know your git commands?
description: This exercise will help you understand the different git commands

validation_fields.name: answer1
validation_fields.label: What git command shows modified files in working a directory that are staged for your next commit. This include files to be committed, un-staged and untracked files

validation_fields.name: answer2
validation_fields.label: What command allows you to add files to staging and tracking changes?

validation_fields.name: answer3
validation_fields.label: What command commits your changes and creates a new snapshot to your local machine?

validation_fields.name: answer4
validation_fields.label: What command will update your remote repository to the latest changes from your local machine?

validation_fields.name: answer5
validation_fields.label: What command allows you to get the latest changes from the remote repository to your local machine?

validation_fields.name: answer6
validation_fields.label: What command allows you to download an entire repository using a URL?

validation_fields.name: answer7
validation_fields.label: If you have a project that is not currently a git repository, what command would allow you to add git repository to the existing project?
